businessProfile.name: PVD Pizza West Warwick
businessProfile.address: 49 Providence St, West Warwick, RI 02893, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 49 Providence St, West Warwick, RI 02893, USA

reviews.text: Ordered a cheese pizza and was very disappointed. This was one of the most disgusting pizzas I have ever seen. Not sure if they were busy, but this really should not be acceptable to give to a customer.

1st time trying PVD Pizza (West Warwick) we like taco pizza so we ordered an xl taco pizza . Needless to say no salsa on it , the sour cream is cooked in the bottom of the layers supposedly sliced meatballs  that I saw which were thinly sliced. And was supposed to have taco seasoning in them.  I picked up to take out along w a fry . The fries were ok but $7.50 for the size was enough for my two sons. Was very disappointed w the pizza. I even said to the girl at the counter . I hope this food is very good . This is the 1st time we ordered from any PVD Pizza .I asked does it come w the sour cream on the side w salsa she stated .No . I said , oh ok.   Now after getting home seeing the pizzas but then eating it. Totally disappointed ‚òπÔ∏è.  The taco pizza has no taco seasoning whatsoever.   Smh

My husband and I used to come on Wednesday nights for there half off wings. There wings are the ONLY thing worth spending your money on. I‚Äôve tried their pizza (disgusting cardboard taste), fries, fried pickles, and there pulled pork fries. First of all- the pulled fork fries look disgusting. We customized them to add bacon and onions, we didn‚Äôt receive that. They are also supposed to come with BBQ sauce‚Ä¶ missing. Spent a good amount of money here to be thrown away. Will only come back for their wings. Save your money on everything else

I live very close to PVD Pizza West Warwick. The food is good. However, I had a very bad experience with service. On Friday night, I ordered nachos and a make your own calzone with spinach, mushrooms, and blue cheese. When I picked it up,  I put it in the fridge for dinner  Saturday night. When I got home Saturday, it was very late ( after they were closed). I noticed that it tasted strange. It was chicken parm which I had not ordered. I called Sunday to let them know that I received the wrong order. I even had most of it left and offered to bring it in to show that I had received the wrong order The manager stated that the owner refused to do anything because it had been too long. I was not looking for free food. I just wanted the calzone for which I paid. The owner still refused to do anything. I will never order from there again That is a shame since the food is good., and the waitstaff are very nice.  They have lost  a frequent customer over one calzone!!!!  I even had an account with them where I earned points with orders. I have never before complained, but this was the wrong order. I would advise that if you order from here, to check your order immediately to make sure it is right because otherwise they will not help you.

First time ordering & the food was not bad but my order was wrong. Did not get the right salad & my other salad was made wrong. Was disappointed. Not sure we will be back for a second time. My son liked his pizza & loaded fries so maybe.

recentReviews.text: The website said 13.99 for a large pizza and .75 for a vegetable topping. They charged me 14.99 for the pizza and $1 for the topping after I ordered from their website.
One first time and ordered an Italian grinder.It was ok. Not a true Italian. The mest was light but tasty

Ordered a cheese pizza and was very disappointed. This was one of the most disgusting pizzas I have ever seen. Not sure if they were busy, but this really should not be acceptable to give to a customer.

Ordered delivery on uber eats and 2 items were missing. Uber driver said they didnt have a receipt to give them so they couldnt check the order. When i called they said the items were still there and they asked me to come pick them up.

First time ordering & the food was not bad but my order was wrong. Did not get the right salad & my other salad was made wrong. Was disappointed. Not sure we will be back for a second time. My son liked his pizza & loaded fries so maybe.

detailedReviews.author: Richard Tierney
detailedReviews.text: The website said 13.99 for a large pizza and .75 for a vegetable topping. They charged me 14.99 for the pizza and $1 for the topping after I ordered from their website.

detailedReviews.author: lu gutmon
detailedReviews.text: Long time to wait

detailedReviews.author: Crystal Silva
detailedReviews.text: One first time and ordered an Italian grinder.It was ok. Not a true Italian. The mest was light but tasty

detailedReviews.author: Anthony P
detailedReviews.text: Excellent meatball sandwiches and pizza

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Yang
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a cheese pizza and was very disappointed. This was one of the most disgusting pizzas I have ever seen. Not sure if they were busy, but this really should not be acceptable to give to a customer.

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Hoydich
detailedReviews.text: Ordered delivery on uber eats and 2 items were missing. Uber driver said they didnt have a receipt to give them so they couldnt check the order. When i called they said the items were still there and they asked me to come pick them up.

detailedReviews.author: Catherine Brenner
detailedReviews.text: First time ordering & the food was not bad but my order was wrong. Did not get the right salad & my other salad was made wrong. Was disappointed. Not sure we will be back for a second time. My son liked his pizza & loaded fries so maybe.

detailedReviews.author: Annie
detailedReviews.text: I live very close to PVD Pizza West Warwick. The food is good. However, I had a very bad experience with service. On Friday night, I ordered nachos and a make your own calzone with spinach, mushrooms, and blue cheese. When I picked it up,  I put it in the fridge for dinner  Saturday night. When I got home Saturday, it was very late ( after they were closed). I noticed that it tasted strange. It was chicken parm which I had not ordered. I called Sunday to let them know that I received the wrong order. I even had most of it left and offered to bring it in to show that I had received the wrong order The manager stated that the owner refused to do anything because it had been too long. I was not looking for free food. I just wanted the calzone for which I paid. The owner still refused to do anything. I will never order from there again That is a shame since the food is good., and the waitstaff are very nice.  They have lost  a frequent customer over one calzone!!!!  I even had an account with them where I earned points with orders. I have never before complained, but this was the wrong order. I would advise that if you order from here, to check your order immediately to make sure it is right because otherwise they will not help you.

detailedReviews.text: My husband and I used to come on Wednesday nights for there half off wings. There wings are the ONLY thing worth spending your money on. I‚Äôve tried their pizza (disgusting cardboard taste), fries, fried pickles, and there pulled pork fries. First of all- the pulled fork fries look disgusting. We customized them to add bacon and onions, we didn‚Äôt receive that. They are also supposed to come with BBQ sauce‚Ä¶ missing. Spent a good amount of money here to be thrown away. Will only come back for their wings. Save your money on everything else

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Devona
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza üçï

detailedReviews.author: Erin
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza employees are nice and the atmosphere was great definitely recommend their cheese pizza delicious

detailedReviews.author: Darren Branner
detailedReviews.text: Would not recommend

detailedReviews.author: NIKITA JOSHI
detailedReviews.text:
Horrible service!! Ordered online saying pizza will be ready by 6pm didn't receive it till 6:37pm. As the host didn't put the order in even after booking it online.

Never going there again!!!
Bad customer service

detailedReviews.author: Tom Mosnx
detailedReviews.text:
Absolutely disgusting food and some of the rudest people I‚Äôve ever seen working in a restaurant
This place is a disrespectful disgrace to the community

detailedReviews.author: Princess Hannah
detailedReviews.text: Don't order online they lie about the times and make you wait while 3 other people walk in after you and leave before you smh.

detailedReviews.author: Kayla S
detailedReviews.text: Great service with amazing nachos ‚Ä¶. Cheered me up for sure and kid friendly pool on this Wednesday night

detailedReviews.author: Chris P
detailedReviews.text: The Pizza used to be a lot greasier but somehow it was better and now I get a pizza and it's dry. Super dry like they couldn't have met in the middle with the excessive grease and drying it out

detailedReviews.author: Jacquelin Mitchell
detailedReviews.text: 1st time trying PVD Pizza (West Warwick) we like taco pizza so we ordered an xl taco pizza . Needless to say no salsa on it , the sour cream is cooked in the bottom of the layers supposedly sliced meatballs  that I saw which were thinly sliced. And was supposed to have taco seasoning in them.  I picked up to take out along w a fry . The fries were ok but $7.50 for the size was enough for my two sons. Was very disappointed w the pizza. I even said to the girl at the counter . I hope this food is very good . This is the 1st time we ordered from any PVD Pizza .I asked does it come w the sour cream on the side w salsa she stated .No . I said , oh ok.   Now after getting home seeing the pizzas but then eating it. Totally disappointed ‚òπÔ∏è.  The taco pizza has no taco seasoning whatsoever.   Smh

detailedReviews.author: Corey Maples
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was dry. tasteless! tasted like cardboard. Worse pizza I ever tasted

detailedReviews.author: Heather W
detailedReviews.text: Pizza sauce has no flavor and greasy. Cheese fries were soggy.

detailedReviews.author: Ann Hussey
detailedReviews.text: My grinder was not prepared as requested. The pizza was delicious hot and fresh

detailedReviews.author: Jim Bowry
detailedReviews.text: Bestest Philly steak & cheese in town!  The bestest üòã

detailedReviews.author: Olivia Guadagno
detailedReviews.text: I love coming to PVD! The food is always great and the I always feel very welcomed. My favorite place to go to when I need some delicious comfort food!!

detailedReviews.author: Tony Corrente
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was great but I also ordered garlic bread with cheese. It was delivered without garlic or cheese. I received toasted bread

detailedReviews.author: Jesse Schwartz
detailedReviews.text: I was starving, driving around when I stumbled upon this place, I stopped in and found my new favorite spot to go to!! The food is fantastic and it‚Äôs like I was making it for myself, it was pretty well done for ‚Äújust a pizza joint‚Äù one of the best calzones I have ever had!

detailedReviews.author: Tara Moore
detailedReviews.text: Chuck the cook there makes the best dishes and pizzas I‚Äôve had in a long time ( plus best part he‚Äôs my husband ü•∞) and I‚Äôm from NY , definitely worth a trip here the atmosphere is comfy and the staff is friendly

detailedReviews.author: Coco Melon
detailedReviews.text:
I got very sick from eating here. I'm not sure what the conditions are in this establishment, but I've contracted food poisoning from eating their food.

I made a doordash order for pizza and a burger two days ago. The food arrived, and the pizza was blah, and the burger was PINK. I made sure to request "well done" for the burger patty which was an option on the doordash website, and the patty hardly came close to medium rare. So it's safe to say they blatantly ignored my selection.

Then I made a mistake. I ate it anyway. As I write this I am still dealing with sulfur burps, extremely painful stomach cramps, and diarrhea. Not to mention me vomiting earlier. Not sure if it's e.coli or what, but this is the kind of thing that will make me never return. No food is worth suffering for. Especially food that doesn't taste that good. The pizza was mediocre, as was the burger. The only great thing was the food arriving hot. If you have low immunity or a sensitive stomach, I'm going to have to warn you to skip this place. Or if you persist on ordering here, don't get meat.

detailedReviews.author: Stephen Wayne
detailedReviews.text: Great local pizza place, food was delicious and service was great

detailedReviews.author: Lisa B
detailedReviews.text: This evening I was looking forward to a yummy Cesar Salad, tho it wasn't terrible, I can't say enough, Dehydrated shaker parmesan cheese does not belong on a salad! If I'm paying $10 for a salad with no protein, then give me real Parmesan.

detailedReviews.author: Cory See
detailedReviews.text: Great first impression of this pizzeria. The pizza is delicious and highly addictive. I got curbside service, so can't speak to the atmosphere. But I'm definitely going back for seconds and thirds... go forth! Be a high five.  Sometimes the six is good. Seven is heaven, ones you eight there for the ninth time. Don't let the situation get tenth!

detailedReviews.author: Alexia Belle
detailedReviews.text: v nice people every time I come in to pick up, always good food & the kitchen actually listens to the special requests!! a while back they also gave me a free dessert just for being pregnant so gotta love them for thatüòÇ

detailedReviews.author: EveryRose HasAThorn
detailedReviews.text: Don't waste your time coming here. Nothing is good here. Food is never consistent. Staff are rude and not attentive at all. I've witnessed staff drinking on the job. Do not recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Viv V TheSyckness
detailedReviews.text: We order pizza . Update June 2024. We ordered  two Italian Grinders onion rings and a piece of chicken for a pet. Something was rotten and I was sick for several days. I will never order from them again.

detailedReviews.author: Dainties Gomes
detailedReviews.text: good food

detailedReviews.author: Maureen J Sweeney
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and fast, polite delivery driver!

detailedReviews.author: Alyssa (Alyssa)
detailedReviews.text: Ordered delivery from PVD Pizza tonight for the first time. It definitely won't be the last. The entire family really enjoyed the pizza, onion rings, and French fries. The chori√ßo pizza was amazing! My husband loved his prosciutto and pineapple, and the kids also were really impressed with their pepperoni and bacon pizza. 10/10 !

detailedReviews.author: Tricia Ambrosino
detailedReviews.text: PVD's food is really pretty good. There was only one time that I ordered something and really, really didn't like it. The prices aren't bad at all and the delivery always goes very well. I definitely recommend anyone to try them.

detailedReviews.author: Mlegion1988
detailedReviews.text: Mixed review, ordered delivery on 5/9/2024 and it took over an hour to be delivered however the food was hot and fresh. The wings were excellent, also ordered a chicken parm pasta dish, did not receive the bread that is told comes with it. Asked for light sauce, dish was swimming in sauce. The chicken was really good in the dish however the sauce was bland. Fried Oreos were really good. Overall with tip spent $50 on two dishes and the dessert, tax and tip.

detailedReviews.author: Norman Acciola
detailedReviews.text: Love it here.... Great food

detailedReviews.author: Amanda Auble
detailedReviews.text: We ordered 2 different pizzas and a Greek salad....They were both delicious!  Pizza was awesome, cooked perfectly and crust was chewy outside w tender middle just like I like it!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Anastasia Egan official
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm coming back for those spicy garlic Parmesan wings

detailedReviews.author: Lisa N
detailedReviews.text: Hands down best pizza and grinder in years.  I have found my spot.

detailedReviews.author: Nathan Messier
detailedReviews.text: Great place, pool, karaoke, and wing nights.

detailedReviews.author: Mikey Mac
detailedReviews.text: Great food, good prices

detailedReviews.author: Dan McCormick
detailedReviews.text: Everything was awesome, the pizza (pineapple, but don‚Äôt let that take any credibility away from the 5 stars) the Cajun steak wrap, potato skins and Caprese salad. Delivery was fast too, they said 45 minutes but it got there in like 35.

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Carvalho
detailedReviews.text: I love this place wings are my favorite ‚ù§Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Ash
detailedReviews.text: Wanted some comfort food on this cold snowy day. Ordered my favorite pizza. Barbecue pulled pork, extra cheese no onion but added mushrooms. Chicken tenders are an added bonus. Easily my favorite pizza place since Donahues closed.

detailedReviews.author: Loyal
detailedReviews.text: The manager Shane goes above and beyond for the customers.

detailedReviews.author: Heather v
detailedReviews.text: *Update they at least gave me my money back in credit to get something else from them* I went into PVD pizza for the first time on a whim as I was driving by and thinking I would try somewhere new, I ordered chicken caprese sandwich and some pretzel bites with beer cheese to go. My sandwich was a sloppy as It ever could be the tomatoes were squishy and it did not taste at all like a chicken Caprice I'm pretty sure it had some sort of blue cheese on it it was disgusting. The pretzel bites were over fried and the beer cheese was cold. Needless to say I am never going back to this establishment ever again I was very unsatisfied with my lunch and wasted money..

detailedReviews.author: Charlene Ouellette
detailedReviews.text: Best potato skins üòã

detailedReviews.author: Kenny C
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza. They added broccoli into our chicken.alfredo.pizza . The crust was unbelievable so light and the chicken caeser wrap the chicken was actually warm never had it.like that before !! Hidden.Gem.for sure. Right around the corner from.the High School Hockey rink. Not even 2 minutes !. PS They make a great cocktail !!

detailedReviews.author: Tom in the Shop
detailedReviews.text:
I find their pizza to be the best in the West Warwick area.  Good crust, fresh toppings. (Good wings, too.)
I order take out, so I can't speak to the atmosphere. Though it seems a bit stark..

detailedReviews.author: Eli Leb
detailedReviews.text: I feel this place is starting to cut corners and it's sad it's going down to this. Ordered wings 16pcs to be exact and back then they were the jumbo wings now they are the smallest I have ever seen. Literally more bone than meat. So have the pizzas, they lack cheese!!!

detailedReviews.author: Wendy Raymond
detailedReviews.text: I think my wrap would have been better if it was cold grilled chicken with Ceasar and if it had croutons in it. I will order again just not this wrap.

detailedReviews.author: Lindsay Gavin
detailedReviews.text: üòã yummy

detailedReviews.author: Kristen Kurbiec
detailedReviews.text: Service was very good and friendly from the bartender/waitress, delivery guy (held the door for me and my friend) to the cook. The food was fine, drinks were great, price was right. The only issue was the musty, old mop bucket water smell that overpowered the aroma of the food.

detailedReviews.author: karmen burgess
detailedReviews.text: Never really had a bad experience with this place other the the wait time but good food takes time. I also really liked receiving penne pasta instead of the huge ones they had before but beer cheese 10/10 recommended

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Kennelly
detailedReviews.text: The guy working the counter made a smart remark towards my mother. He definitely doesn't want to be there,  tough to find good help these days

detailedReviews.author: Jgadstylez Roblox Queen
detailedReviews.text: I never been inside so I can‚Äôt rate it,  but we‚Äôve had nothing but great food and friendly customer service. We order all the time

detailedReviews.author: S
detailedReviews.text: This is the best pizza! I love the portion and taste! If you don‚Äôt try anything else, you must try the cheesy bread! The wings are crispy and sauced with just enough sauce to taste it and have you lick your fingers. The atmosphere is a vibe with the jukebox playing all the jams in the background. It‚Äôs a great place for lunch with the family and dinner with the friends.

detailedReviews.author: Liz Goulart
detailedReviews.text: Food was very good as well as service, unfortunately there were a lot of dead and live bugs on and around my table...

detailedReviews.author: Crystal C
detailedReviews.text: Very greasy pizza

detailedReviews.author: David
detailedReviews.text: They have some good wings

detailedReviews.author: Unknown Person
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was delivered 1.5 hour later! Box and pizza was cold! No apology. Had to reheat it and they forgot to put the extras on that I asked for! I call them and they just said ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre sorry‚Äù and then nothing. Everything went wrong from beginning to end. Terrible

detailedReviews.author: Already Cocked And Loaded
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza is too soggy, pepperoni is cheap, cheese tastes like nothing.
That being said, French fries are on point, Buffalo chicken is on point, good flavor and spice.
Salads are run off the mill, not really the freshest tasting, gray yolks in eggs, peppers wilting, lettuce slightly soggy and brown.
I wanted to like this place, but I‚Äôll only be looking to this for chicken items in the future.

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Pomerleau
detailedReviews.text: Awesome spot, very accommodating. Pizza was excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Guy Kelly
detailedReviews.text: Came here with my son‚Äôs hockey team after a game.  The staff was very friendly and the food was great!

detailedReviews.author: bala shanmugam
detailedReviews.text: Stopped for a late lunch after hockey game. We had the whole team, about 12 kids and 8 adults. Great pizza. Pool tables to keep the kids busy.

detailedReviews.author: D
detailedReviews.text: Had a Italian sandwich it was not good at all very chewy meat & first one ever had without pickles ever other than that usually good there.

detailedReviews.author: Ann Albro-Mathieu
detailedReviews.text: I love their food. Everything I've ever ordered has been awesome, and their delivery is quick! However, they've been stingy with some of their items lately. I understand prices going up because prices are going up everywhere, but I don't understand also serving puny portions at that increased price. My husband ordered Buffalo Chicken Wings at $9.99, and his order is on the left. I ordered the BBQ faux chicken wings with fries. They cost $13.99, did not come with any BBQ sauce and are the order on right. It almost looks like a children's meal. A few months back, I ordered the corkscrew shrimp. The price had just increased from $7.99 to $9.99. I'm okay with that because I'm still going to get a small restaurant container full, right? No. Actually, I received 7 (seven) shrimp spirals. I thought some had fallen out of the container or maybe the driver got hungry or something else unexpected had happened to cause these tiny shrimp pieces to cost $1.25 each. No. The person I spoke with on the phone told me that they were decreasing their portions (while increasing the price) due to the ecomony. So, I haven't purchased the shrimp since. I would've thought that would put an end to the inconsistencies in portions to price. Until today. We've been frequent customers of theirs since they first opened their doors in West Warwick, but I'm probably going to start looking for other establishments for take out/delivery. We'll probably still order pizza from there, but only pizza, because at least you know what you're getting with a pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Diamond Centofanti
detailedReviews.text: There is no better pizza place in Rhode Island...not only their pizza but wings ,subs ,grinders are all great...

detailedReviews.author: Aly Goncalves
detailedReviews.text: The food is great but kind of disappointed with prices skyrocketing. One tiny pizza, a small fry and small drink for 27 and change, that's almost 10 dollars per item just very expensive and disappointed

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.7/5 rating from 100 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the delicious and fresh pizza, with specific mentions of cheese pizza and calzones being among the best they've ever had. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The welcoming atmosphere and friendly staff create a comforting dining experience that makes customers feel at home. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
Unique and standout menu items like the Philly steak & cheese and loaded fries are highly praised by customers. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Incorrect pricing and order issues on the website - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and inaccurate online order times - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern

neutral.author: Crystal Silva
neutral.text: One first time and ordered an Italian grinder.It was ok. Not a true Italian. The mest was light but tasty

negative.author: Richard Tierney
negative.text: The website said 13.99 for a large pizza and .75 for a vegetable topping. They charged me 14.99 for the pizza and $1 for the topping after I ordered from their website.

negative.author: Melissa Yang
negative.text: Ordered a cheese pizza and was very disappointed. This was one of the most disgusting pizzas I have ever seen. Not sure if they were busy, but this really should not be acceptable to give to a customer.

negative.author: Aaron Hoydich
negative.text: Ordered delivery on uber eats and 2 items were missing. Uber driver said they didnt have a receipt to give them so they couldnt check the order. When i called they said the items were still there and they asked me to come pick them up.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews

recommendations.title: Improve Customer Satisfaction
recommendations.description: Address common issues mentioned in reviews
recommendations.impact: Boost overall rating and customer retention
